jrtr

Interface SceneManagerInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleSceneManager

    public interface SceneManagerInterface
    An interface declaration for scene managers. Scene managers need to provide an iterator to traverse through all objects in the scene. The interface does not specify how objects are added to the scene, since this may differ based on the implementation of the interface. Scene managers also need to store a Camera and a view Frustum.

      Frustum getFrustum()
